## ResourceHandler.load() method

Load a specific resource

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
load(data: ResourceSchema, files: Map<string, Blob>): Promise<Resource[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | ResourceSchema | a data resource being loaded |
|  files | Map&lt;string, Blob&gt; | the data files in the package |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Resource](./workflow.resource.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;
